# FileWrapper.WritingOptions

**Structure**

Writing options that can be set by the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/FileWrapper/write(to:options:originalContentsURL:)] method.

## Declaration

```swift
struct WritingOptions
```

## Constants

- **atomic**: Whether writing is done atomically.
- **withNameUpdating**: Whether descendant file wrappers’[doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/FileWrapper/filename] properties are set if the writing succeeds.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Constants

- **FileWrapper.ReadingOptions**: Reading options that can be set by the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/FileWrapper/init(url:options:)] and [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/FileWrapper/read(from:options:)] methods.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- ExpressibleByArrayLiteral
- OptionSet
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
- SetAlgebra
